snippet.title: DARQ - The Tower (DLC teaser)
snippet.description:
DARQ first DLC "The Tower" is coming to Steam and GOG on March 6th - as promised, it will be made available for free, as a Thank You to the community who showed a lot of support for DARQ when it launched. One more free DLC is coming. 

Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1210400/DARQ__The_Tower/
Wishlist on GOG: https://www.gog.com/game/darq_the_tower

WEBSITE: http://DarqGame.com
TWITTER: https://twitter.com/UnfoldGames
INSTAGRAM: https://www.instagram.com/unfoldgames
FACEBOOK: https://www.facebook.com/UnfoldGames
PRESS KIT: http://darqgame.com/presskit.html
MERCHANDISE: https://teespring.com/stores/darq

DARQ is a psychological horror game that tells the story of Lloyd, a boy who becomes aware of the fact that he is dreaming. The dream quickly turns into a nightmare and all attempts to wake up end in failure. 

Art direction / Music: Wlad Marhulets
Logo Design: Kelsey Haley
Sound Design: Bjørn Jacobsen
Sound Mix: Adam Schmidt
Voice Over: Jaren Machado
